articles.author: Andrew French
articles.title: Watford head coach Bilic has defensive injury problems - Watford Observer
articles.description: William Troost-Ekong returns , late fitness test for Francisco Sierralta but Mario Gaspar, Kortney Hause, Craig Cathcart and Joao Pedro out.
articles.content: William Troost-Ekong returns to the Watford squad for tomorrows game at Blackpool and there will be a late decision on Francisco Sierralta as the defensive injury list continues to cause head coach S… [+7089 chars]

articles.author: Samuel Gill
articles.title: Aspinall reflects on Noppert incident at World Grand Prix: "He'd seen his bum at the end that's all I can say" - Dartsnews.com
articles.description: Nathan Aspinall sealed a 3-2 win over Danny Noppert at the W
articles.content:
Nathan Aspinall sealed a 3-2 win over Danny Noppert at the World Grand Prix in Leicester in a game marred by issues with the crowd as 'The Asp' came from two sets down to seal it.
